messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Adam. May I know your name, please?
Hi Adam, my name is Paula.
Hello Paula! How can I assist you today?
Well, I'm a bit confused about a payment I made for some Nespresso Coffee Capsules.
I see. Could you please provide me with more details about the issue you're facing with the payment?
Sure, I placed an order for Nespresso Coffee Capsules last week, and I think the payment went through twice. I only received one order confirmation.
I understand, Paula. Let me check your account and the order details. Could you please provide me with your order number or email address associated with the purchase?
My order number is 789456123, and the email I used is paula@example.com.
Thank you, Paula. Please hold on for a moment while I look into this for you.

Thank you for waiting, Paula. I have checked your account and it appears that the payment was indeed processed twice. I apologize for the inconvenience. I will initiate a refund for the duplicate payment right away.
Oh, okay. Thank you, Adam. How long will it take for the refund to be processed?
The refund should be processed within 3-5 business days. You will receive a confirmation email once the refund has been issued.
Alright, thank you. I was really worried there for a moment.
I'm glad I could help clarify the situation, Paula. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to ask.
That's all for now. Thanks again, Adam.
You're welcome, Paula. Have a great day!
